content: Enter the password for the user with the access rights to read data from LDAP server.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining the password field's purpose in an LDAP authentication setup. It appears on a form component, specifically above the password input field, and is intended to help users understand what they are required to enter.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'access rights' is too literal. A more natural Arabic equivalent for this context would be something along the lines of 'صلاحيات الوصول' (Salahiyat al-wusul).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل كلمة المرور للمستخدم الذي لديه صلاحيات الوصول لقراءة البيانات من دليل LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but lacks the nuance of the English tooltip. 'Enter the password for the user...' is more natural than 'Şifrəsini daxil edin.' A more user-friendly option would be to rephrase to better reflect the purpose of the password entry.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP serverindən məlumat oxumaq üçün istifadəçinin parolu daxil edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'LDAP server' at the beginning of the sentence makes it a bit clunky. It's better to integrate this into the sentence flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggestion in the incorrect_translation also fixes this formatting issue.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'access rights' is not accurately translated. 'Přístupová práva' is a literal translation but sounds less natural. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'opravnění' or 'uživatelské oprávnění'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte heslo uživatele s uživatelskými oprávněními pro čtení dat ze serveru LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Greek. The phrase "δικαιώματα πρόσβασης για την ανάγνωση" is redundant.  'Δικαιώματα ανάγνωσης' is sufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό πρόσβασης για τον χρήστη με δικαιώματα ανάγνωσης από τον διακομιστή LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop at the end of the sentence, which is grammatically correct but may not be consistent with the application's style guide. This depends on how other tooltip translations are formatted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the full stop at the end if the application prefers shorter tooltips.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a single, long sentence. It could be improved by splitting it into two for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saisissez le mot de passe de l'utilisateur. Cet utilisateur doit avoir les droits d'accès pour lire les données du serveur LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation is a bit too literal and sounds unnatural. 'Մուտքագրեք օգտվողի գաղտնաբառը, ով ունի LDAP սերվերից տվյալները կարդալու մուտքի իրավունք:' directly translates to 'Enter the password of the user who has the right to read data from the LDAP server.' A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Enter the password for the user who has access to read data from the LDAP server.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք օգտվողի գաղտնաբառը, ով ունի մուտքի իրավունք LDAP սերվերից տվյալներ կարդալու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Inserisci la password per l'utente con diritti di accesso per leggere i dati dal server LDAP' is a bit verbose and not the most natural phrasing in Italian. The phrase 'diritti di accesso per leggere' is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Inserisci la password dell'utente con i permessi per leggere i dati dal server LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical error, the Italian translation could benefit from a slightly more formal tone to match the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding a more formal phrasing like 'Inserire' instead of 'Inserisci' - e.g., 'Inserire la password...'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ໃສ່ລະຫັດລັບສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີສິດອະນຸຍາດອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Lao. 'ລະຫັດລັບ' translates to 'secret code', which while technically correct, isn't the most natural phrasing in this context. 'ອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນ' also sounds a bit formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃສ່ລະຫັດຜ່ານສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ສາມາດອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'lai nolasītu datus no LDAP servera' is a bit literal and could be improved for better flow in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be 'lai piekļūtu LDAP serverim'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ievadiet paroli lietotājam ar piekļuves tiesībām, lai piekļūtu LDAP serverim.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content emphasizes the user having access rights, while the Polish translation simply states 'user'. It lacks the nuance of 'access rights'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wprowadź hasło użytkownika, który ma uprawnienia dostępu do odczytu danych z serwera LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Insira a senha do usuário com direitos de acesso para ler dados do servidor LDAP' is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness in Portuguese. A more idiomatic phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Insira a senha do usuário com permissão para ler dados do servidor LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Introduceți parola pentru utilizatorul cu permisiuni de citire pentru serverul LDAP' is not a precise translation of the English content. 'Permisiuni de citire' could be improved. The English phrasing 'access rights to read data' implies more than just 'read permissions'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți parola pentru utilizatorul cu drepturi de acces pentru a citi date de pe serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for a more natural flow in Romanian. The use of 'pentru' repeated twice is a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți parola utilizatorului care are dreptul să citească date de pe serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයා' (parishilakayaa) is archaic and not commonly used in modern Sinhala. A more appropriate word would be 'භාවිතරයා' (bhavitaraayaa) or 'පරිශ්‍රමිකරුවා' (parashramikaruwaa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP සර්වරයෙන් දත්ත කියවීමට අයිතිය ඇති භාවිතරයා/පරිශ්‍රමිකරුවා සඳහා මුරපදය ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure 'LDAP සර්වරයෙන් දත්ත කියවීමට අයිතිය ඇති...' could be slightly improved for clarity and flow. It's a bit long.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP සර්වරයෙන් දත්ත කියවීමට බලයක් ඇති පරිශීලකයා/භාවිතරයා සඳහා මුරපදය ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'правима' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'права'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Унесите лозинку за корисника са правима приступа за читање података са LDAP сервера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'lozinku' should be 'lozanku'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Unesite lozanku za korisnika sa pravima pristupa za čitanje podataka sa LDAP servera.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is somewhat literal and could be more natural. While technically correct, it reads a bit awkwardly in Turkish. The phrase 'LDAP sunucusu veri okuma erişim haklarına sahip kullanıcı' is long and complex.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP sunucusundan veri okuma yetkisine sahip kullanıcı şifresini girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation doesn't use any capitalization after the initial 'LDAP'. While not strictly wrong, it is common to capitalize the beginning of sentences and after certain punctuation marks in Turkish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP sunucusundan veri okuma yetkisine sahip kullanıcı şifresini girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nhập mật khẩu cho người dùng có quyền truy cập để đọc dữ liệu từ máy chủ LDAP' is a literal translation and can be improved for naturalness. It's a bit clunky in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập mật khẩu của người dùng có quyền truy cập vào máy chủ LDAP để đọc dữ liệu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'đọc dữ liệu từ máy chủ LDAP' is a bit long and could be shortened for better readability, although the original English isn't particularly concise either. The suggested correction addresses this slightly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No specific suggestion as it is a minor stylistic point.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly verbose and doesn't capture the concise nature of the English tooltip. It's technically correct but reads awkwardly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 输入 LDAP 服务器读取数据的用户密码。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Chinese translation lacks a natural flow and could be improved for readability, potentially through slight reordering of phrases.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 请输入用于从 LDAP 服务器读取数据的用户的密码。
